prompt: Sell a pen that ‘writes better answers during vivas.’
human: This pen doesn’t just write — it gaslights professors into thinking you’re brilliant.
ai: Introducing the VivaMaster 3000 — a pen so confident, even your nonsense sounds Nobel-worthy.
feedback: AI's punchline was sharper and nailed the sarcastic tone better.

prompt: Create a dating app that only matches people who’ve failed the same exam.
human: We bond over breakdowns. Introducing FailFlame — your F in love.
ai: Welcome to 'ReboundU' — where failed attempts become full marks in romance. Because misery loves algorithm.
feedback: Human's response had better branding and was more clever with the concept.
